targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(ts),
  (payload->>'temperature')::numeric AS value,
  payload->>'tag' AS metric
FROM public.measurements
WHERE topic LIKE 'paku/%/sens/ruuvi/%'
  AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__time(ts),
  (payload->>'humidity')::numeric AS value,
  payload->>'tag' AS metric
FROM public.measurements
WHERE topic LIKE 'paku/%/sens/ruuvi/%'
  AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__time(ts),
  (payload->>'battery')::numeric AS value,
  payload->>'tag' AS metric
FROM public.measurements
WHERE topic LIKE 'paku/%/sens/ruuvi/%'
  AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  $__time(ts),
  (payload->>'rssi')::numeric AS value,
  payload->>'tag' AS metric
FROM public.measurements
WHERE topic LIKE 'paku/%/sens/ruuvi/%'
  AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;
